page.title: 20Woodthorpe N.F. & M. School
page.content:
To cook school dinners there is 1 cook and 9 Kitchen Assistants. There are about 10 ladies who clean the school, and two caretakers. Children join the nursary school when they are 3 or 4 ,and begin coming for half the day. At 5 they join the First Department and the Middle Department is for children aged 8_12. Children leave at 12 to go to secondary school.
These pages were written and typed by children from M3 and M4 Children at Woodthorpe School. The counts for the Survey were carried out by children from this school and Bluestones Middle School. Thanks to the Manor Mercury for some ideas and information.
